question: ‘Parampara Series 2020-National Festival of Music and Dance’, that was recently inaugurated is organized in association with which global body?
explanation:
The Vice President M. Venkaiah Naidu has inaugurated the virtual festival of ‘Parampara Series 2020-National Festival of Music and Dance’.
The festival is being organised by Natya Tarangini in partnership with the United Nations. The Natya Tarangini dance school has been organising the ‘Parampara Series’ continuously for the past 23 years.
